line.comment: * Returns [FALSE] if the trade fails, [TRUE] otherwise.
* If the consumer has enough, we abort.
* External trade limit, from Player to NPC.
* If we have to unload at our own Outpost, we need to ignore any previous lock, but we still want to lock the sale if an external Trader wants to trade with us.

sval.val: Returns [FALSE] if the trade fails, [TRUE] otherwise.
If the consumer has enough, we abort.
External trade limit, from Player to NPC.
If we have to unload at our own Outpost, we need to ignore any previous lock, but we still want to lock the sale if an external Trader wants to trade with us.
